Attribute.Name: RefreshPeriod
Attribute.Description: Amount of seconds to refresh the dashboard automatically (0 means no refresh).

Attribute.Name: FiltersPosition
Attribute.Description: Filters position in the dashboard layout.

Attribute.Name: MainTableLayout
Attribute.Description: Layout used to arrange the widgets in the dashboard.

Attribute.Name: FrameVisible
Attribute.Description: True if the widget has a frame.

Attribute.Name: Title
Attribute.Description: Title that will be displayed on top of the query.

Attribute.Name: ShowValues
Attribute.Description: Specifies whether to show the values for the data elements, or not.

Attribute.Name: ChartType
Attribute.Type: enum{Column;Column 3D;Stacked column;Stacked column 3D;100% Stacked column;Bar;Stacked bar;100% stacked bar;Area;Stacked area;100% stacked area;Smooth area;Step area;Line;Stacked line;100% stacked line;Smooth line;Step line;Timeline;Smooth timeline;Step timeline;Sparkline;Pie;Pie 3D;Doughnut;Doughnut 3D;Linear gauge;Circular gauge;Radar;Filled radar;Polar area;Funnel;Pyramid;Column & Line;Column 3D & Line}
Attribute.Description: Chart type, when rendering as a chart.

Attribute.Name: PlotSeries
Attribute.Type: enum{In the same chart;In separate charts}
Attribute.Description: Specifies if the chart series are plotted together in the same chart or alone in separate charts.

Attribute.Name: XAxisLabels
Attribute.Description: Specifies if the labels in the X axis of a chart are shown horizontally, vertically or rotated a certain angle.

Attribute.Name: XAxisIntersectionAtZero
Attribute.Description: Specifies whether the X axis intersects the Y axis at zero or the intersection point is automatically calculated.

Attribute.Name: ShowDataAs
Attribute.Description: Specifies whether to show the actual values, the values as a percentage of the target values, or both.

Attribute.Name: Orientation
Attribute.Description: Specifies whether to arrange the attributes horizontally or vertically when more than one data attribute is present.

Attribute.Name: IncludeTrend
Attribute.Description: Specifies whether to include a trend mark for the values or not.

Attribute.Name: TrendPeriod
Attribute.Type: enum{Since the beginning;Last year;Last semester;Last quarter;Last month;Last week;Last day;Last hour;Last minute;Last second}
Attribute.Description: Specifies the period of time to calculate the trend.

Attribute.Name: IncludeSparkline
Attribute.Description: Specifies whether to include a sparkline chart for the values or not.

Attribute.Name: IncludeMaxAndMin
Attribute.Description: Specifies whether to include the maximum and minimum values in the series.

Attribute.Name: Paging
Attribute.Description: True to specify if the table or pivot table uses paging; False otherwise.

Attribute.Name: PageSize
Attribute.Description: Page size, when Paging is set to True.

Attribute.Name: ShowDataLabelsIn
Attribute.Description: Specifies whether the data labels for the data elements in a pivot table are shown in the Columns or Rows area. Only meaningful for two or more data elements.

Attribute.Name: TotalForRows
Attribute.Description: Determines whether to show a total for the values in the rows of the pivot table. If you set Yes a total will be shown. If you set No the total won't appear at all.

Attribute.Name: TotalForColumns
Attribute.Description: Determines whether to show a total for the values in the columns of the pivot table. If you set Yes a total will be shown. If you set No the total won't appear at all.

Attribute.Name: MapType
Attribute.Description: Map type, when rendering as a map.

Attribute.Name: Region
Attribute.Description: Specifies whether to display a country, a continent or the entire world map.

Attribute.Name: Continent
Attribute.Description: The continent map that will be displayed.

Attribute.Name: Country
Attribute.Type: namedEnum{Afghanistan=AF;Albania=AL;Algeria=DZ;Andorra=AD;Angola=AO;Anguilla=AI;Antigua and Barbuda=AG;Argentina=AR;Armenia=AM;Australia=AU;Austria=AT;Azerbaijan=AZ;Bahrain=BH;Bangladesh=BD;Barbados=BB;Belarus=BY;Belgium=BE;Belize=BZ;Benin=BJ;Bermuda=BM;Bhutan=BT;Bolivia=BO;Bosnia and Herzegovina=BA;Botswana=BW;Brazil=BR;British Virgin Islands=VG;Brunei=BN;Bulgaria=BG;Burkina Faso=BF;Burundi=BI;Cambodia=KH;Cameroon=CM;Canada=CA;Cape Verde=CV;Central African Republic=CF;Chad=TD;Chile=CL;China=CN;Colombia=CO;Comoros=KM;Cook Islands=CK;Costa Rica=CR;Croatia=HR;Cuba=CU;Cyprus=CY;Czech Republic=CZ;Democratic Republic of the Congo=CD;Denmark=DK;Djibouti=DJ;Dominica=DM;Dominican Republic=DO;East Timor=TL;Ecuador=EC;Egypt=EG;El Salvador=SV;Equatorial Guinea=GQ;Eritrea=ER;Estonia=EE;Eswatini=SZ;Ethiopia=ET;Faroe Islands=FO;Fiji=FJ;Finland=FI;France=FR;Gabon=GA;Gambia=GM;Georgia=GE;Germany=DE;Ghana=GH;Greece=GR;Greenland=GL;Grenada=GD;Guatemala=GT;Guinea=GN;Guinea Bissau=GW;Guyana=GY;Haiti=HT;Honduras=HN;Hungary=HU;Iceland=IS;India=IN;Indonesia=ID;Iran=IR;Iraq=IQ;Ireland=IE;Israel=IL;Italy=IT;Ivory Coast=CI;Jamaica=JM;Japan=JP;Jordan=JO;Kazakhstan=KZ;Kenya=KE;Kiribati=KI;Kosovo=XK;Kuwait=KW;Kyrgyzstan=KG;Laos=LA;Latvia=LV;Lebanon=LB;Lesotho=LS;Liberia=LR;Libya=LY;Liechtenstein=LI;Lithuania=LT;Luxembourg=LU;Madagascar=MG;Malawi=MW;Malaysia=MY;Maldives=MV;Mali=ML;Malta=MT;Marshall Islands=MH;Mauritania=MR;Mauritius=MU;Mexico=MX;Micronesia=FM;Moldova=MD;Monaco=MC;Mongolia=MN;Montenegro=ME;Morocco=MA;Mozambique=MZ;Myanmar=MM;Namibia=NA;Nauru=NR;Nepal=NP;Netherlands=NL;New Zealand=NZ;Nicaragua=NI;Niger=NE;Nigeria=NG;North Korea=KP;North Macedonia=MK;Norway=NO;Oman=OM;Pakistan=PK;Palau=PW;Panama=PA;Palestine=PS;Papua New Guinea=PG;Paraguay=PY;Peru=PE;Philippines=PH;Poland=PL;Portugal=PT;Puerto Rico=PR;Qatar=QA;Republic of the Congo=CG;Romania=RO;Russia=RU;Rwanda=RW;Saint Kitts and Nevis=KN;Saint Lucia=LC;Saint Vincent and the Grenadines=VC;Samoa=WS;San Marino=SM;São Tomé and Príncipe=ST;Saudi Arabia=SA;Senegal=SN;Serbia=RS;Seychelles=SC;Sierra Leone=SL;Singapore=SG;Slovakia=SK;Slovenia=SI;Solomon Islands=SB;Somalia=SO;South Africa=ZA;South Korea=KR;South Sudan=SS;Spain=ES;Sri Lanka=LK;Sudan=SD;Suriname=SR;Sweden=SE;Switzerland=CH;Syria=SY;Taiwan=TW;Tajikistan=TJ;Tanzania=TZ;Thailand=TH;The Bahamas=BS;Togo=TG;Tokelau=TK;Tonga=TO;Trinidad and Tobago=TT;Tunisia=TN;Turkey=TR;Turkmenistan=TM;Tuvalu=TV;Uganda=UG;Ukraine=UA;United Arab Emirates=AE;United Kingdom=GB;United States of America=US;Uruguay=UY;Uzbekistan=UZ;Vanuatu=VU;Vatican City=VA;Venezuela=VE;Vietnam=VN;Western Sahara=EH;Yemen=YE;Zambia=ZM;Zimbabwe=ZW}
Attribute.Description: The country map that will be displayed.

Attribute.Name: OnItemClick
Attribute.Type: enum{Do nothing;Raise ItemClick event;Apply filters;Highlight values}
Attribute.Description: Action to be executed when clicking an item.

Attribute.Name: NameLowerValue
Attribute.Description: Filter name for the lower value.

Attribute.Name: NameUpperValue
Attribute.Description: Filter name for the upper value.

Attribute.Name: MinValue
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[@DataType != 'Boolean' and @DataType != 'GeoPoint' and @DataType != 'Date' and @DataType != 'DateTime' and (@ControlType = 'Edit' or @ControlType = 'Slider') and @FilterType != 'Collection' and @Visible = 'True']

Attribute.Name: MaxValue
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[@DataType != 'Boolean' and @DataType != 'GeoPoint' and @DataType != 'Date' and @DataType != 'DateTime' and (@ControlType = 'Edit' or @ControlType = 'Slider') and @FilterType != 'Collection' and @Visible = 'True']

Attribute.Name: MinValueDate
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[(@DataType = 'Date' or @DataType = 'DateTime') and (@ControlType = 'Edit' or @ControlType = 'Slider') and @FilterType != 'Collection' and @Visible = 'True']

Attribute.Name: MaxValueDate
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[(@DataType = 'Date' or @DataType = 'DateTime') and (@ControlType = 'Edit' or @ControlType = 'Slider') and @FilterType != 'Collection' and @Visible = 'True']

Attribute.Name: Visible
Attribute.Description: False to hide the filter in the dashboard so its value cannot be modified.

Attribute.Name: ControlDynamic
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[(@DataType != 'Boolean') and (@ControlType = 'Check box' or @ControlType = 'Radio button' or @ControlType = 'Combo box' or @ControlType = 'Drop-down list') and @Visible = 'True']
Attribute.Description: True if the control's values are calculated dinamically.

Attribute.Name: ControlValues
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[(@DataType != 'Boolean') and (@ControlType = 'Check box' or @ControlType = 'Radio button' or @ControlType = 'Combo box' or @ControlType = 'Drop-down list') and (@ControlDynamic = 'False') and @Visible = 'True']
Attribute.Description: List of possible values for the filter.

Attribute.Name: ControlItemValues
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[(@DataType != 'Boolean') and (@ControlType = 'Check box' or @ControlType = 'Radio button' or @ControlType = 'Combo box' or @ControlType = 'Drop-down list') and (@ControlDynamic = 'True') and @Visible = 'True']
Attribute.Description: Attribute that returns the control's item values.

Attribute.Name: ControlItemDescriptions
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[(@DataType != 'Boolean') and (@ControlType = 'Check box' or @ControlType = 'Radio button' or @ControlType = 'Combo box' or @ControlType = 'Drop-down list') and (@ControlDynamic = 'True') and @Visible = 'True']
Attribute.Description: Attribute that returns the control's item descriptions.

Attribute.Name: ControlSortDescriptions
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[(@DataType != 'Boolean') and (@ControlType = 'Check box' or @ControlType = 'Radio button' or @ControlType = 'Combo box' or @ControlType = 'Drop-down list') and (@ControlDynamic = 'True') and @Visible = 'True']
Attribute.Description: True to sort alphabetically the values descriptions in the control.

Attribute.Name: ControlEmptyItem
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[(@DataType != 'Boolean') and (@ControlType = 'Check box' or @ControlType = 'Radio button' or @ControlType = 'Combo box' or @ControlType = 'Drop-down list') and @Visible = 'True']

Attribute.Name: ControlEmptyItemText
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[(@DataType != 'Boolean') and (@ControlType = 'Check box' or @ControlType = 'Radio button' or @ControlType = 'Combo box' or @ControlType = 'Drop-down list') and (@ControlEmptyItem = 'True') and @Visible = 'True']
Attribute.Description: Text associated with the empty item.

Attribute.Name: ControlConditionsTokens
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[(@DataType != 'Boolean') and (@ControlType = 'Check box' or @ControlType = 'Radio button' or @ControlType = 'Combo box' or @ControlType = 'Drop-down list') and (@ControlDynamic = 'True') and @Visible = 'True']

Attribute.Name: ControlOrientation
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[((@ControlType = 'Check box' and @FilterType = 'Collection') or @ControlType = 'Radio button') and @Visible = 'True']
Attribute.Description: Specifies whether to arrange the attributes horizontally or vertically.

Attribute.Name: ControlInviteMessage
Attribute.Description: Text to invite the user to interact with the control.

Attribute.Name: Modified
Attribute.Description: True if the filter was modified after it was created.

Attribute.Name: AlternateText
Attribute.Description: Optional text as an alternative to the graphic for rendering in nongraphical environments.

Attribute.Name: Type
Attribute.Description: Data elements contain the relevant information provided by the query, while Axes elements slice and dice that information.

Attribute.Name: Visibility
Attribute.Description: Yes, if the element appears in the selected output (Card, Chart, Map, Pivot Table or Table). No, if the element doesn't appear in the selected output but it can be displayed by selecting it. Never, if the element never appears (invisible elements are still accessible through code, i.e. in the ItemClick event).

Attribute.Name: CanDragToPages
Attribute.Description: Determines whether the element can be placed in the Pages axis or not.

Attribute.Name: Subtotals
Attribute.Description: Determines whether the element can have subtotals or not.

Attribute.Name: ShowValuesAs
Attribute.Description: Displays the values according to the selected calculation.

Attribute.Name: RollingAverageType
Attribute.Description: Type of rolling average to be applied.

Attribute.Name: RollingAverageTerms
Attribute.Description: Number of terms considered in a rolling average calculation.

Attribute.Name: DifferenceFrom
Attribute.Description: Value from which the difference is calculated.

Attribute.Name: ShowAsPercentage
Attribute.Description: Specifies whether the values are expressed as percentages or not.

Attribute.Name: OrderType
Attribute.Description: It allows you to set the order in which the values of the element are displayed.

Attribute.Name: FilterType
Attribute.Type: enum{Show all values;Hide all values;Show some values}
Attribute.Description: It allows you to configure what element's values will be displayed.

Attribute.Name: FilterValues
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[@Visibility != 'Never' and @Type = 'Axis' and @Axis != 'Pages' and @FilterType = 'Show some values']

Attribute.Name: TargetValue
Attribute.Description: Element's target value for a Gauge chart.

Attribute.Name: MaximumValue
Attribute.Description: Element's maximum value for a Gauge chart.

Attribute.Name: ExpandCollapseType
Attribute.Type: enum{Expand all values;Collapse all values;Expand some values}
Attribute.Description: It allows you to configure if the values will be displayed expanded or collapsed.

Attribute.Name: ExpandCollapseValues
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[@Visibility != 'Never' and @Type = 'Axis' and @Axis != 'Pages' and @ExpandCollapseType = 'Expand some values']

Attribute.Name: GroupByYear
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[@Visibility != 'Never' and @Type = 'Axis' and @Axis != 'Pages' and (@DataType = 'Date' or DataType = 'DateTime')]

Attribute.Name: YearTitle
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[@Visibility != 'Never' and @Type = 'Axis' and @Axis != 'Pages' and (@DataType = 'Date' or DataType = 'DateTime') and @GroupByYear = 'True']

Attribute.Name: GroupBySemester
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[@Visibility != 'Never' and @Type = 'Axis' and @Axis != 'Pages' and (@DataType = 'Date' or DataType = 'DateTime')]

Attribute.Name: SemesterTitle
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[@Visibility != 'Never' and @Type = 'Axis' and @Axis != 'Pages' and (@DataType = 'Date' or DataType = 'DateTime') and @GroupBySemester = 'True']

Attribute.Name: GroupByQuarter
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[@Visibility != 'Never' and @Type = 'Axis' and @Axis != 'Pages' and (@DataType = 'Date' or DataType = 'DateTime')]

Attribute.Name: QuarterTitle
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[@Visibility != 'Never' and @Type = 'Axis' and @Axis != 'Pages' and (@DataType = 'Date' or DataType = 'DateTime') and @GroupByQuarter = 'True']

Attribute.Name: GroupByMonth
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[@Visibility != 'Never' and @Type = 'Axis' and @Axis != 'Pages' and (@DataType = 'Date' or DataType = 'DateTime')]

Attribute.Name: MonthTitle
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[@Visibility != 'Never' and @Type = 'Axis' and @Axis != 'Pages' and (@DataType = 'Date' or DataType = 'DateTime') and @GroupByMonth = 'True']

Attribute.Name: GroupByDayOfWeek
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[@Visibility != 'Never' and @Type = 'Axis' and @Axis != 'Pages' and (@DataType = 'Date' or DataType = 'DateTime')]

Attribute.Name: DayOfWeekTitle
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[@Visibility != 'Never' and @Type = 'Axis' and @Axis != 'Pages' and (@DataType = 'Date' or DataType = 'DateTime') and @GroupByDayOfWeek = 'True']

Attribute.Name: HideValue
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[@Visibility != 'Never' and @Type = 'Axis' and @Axis != 'Pages' and (@DataType = 'Date' or DataType = 'DateTime') and (@GroupByYear = 'True' or @GroupBySemester = 'True' or @GroupByQuarter = 'True' or @GroupByMonth = 'True' or @GroupByDayOfWeek = 'True')]

Attribute.Name: RaiseItemClick
Attribute.Description: True if the item raises the ItemClick event when clicked.
